title: First Post
content:
My pen is always leaking now. This blog, a classic example of a procrastination project. Started with the assumption it would only take a day or two, ended up taking a week and a half.

I'd never 'vibe coded' before and curious to see how valid the looming threat of ai is, decided to give it a shot. I started in chat GPT then moved to Copilot, then Cursor.

I knew the aesthetic I wanted in a website, mainly an interface for myself that appeased the pretentious artist tic, and one that I could conceivably post to socials on without ever opening a social media platform. Struck by a dream of shit posting from a pen and paper I embarked.

Very quickly I was able to assemble a preview html and iterate on the aesthetic. The only programming language I know is Lua and I don't have any experience in web development.

I was interested to see if ai was the magic bullet that would allow laypersons to do any task.

After the html preview I used that to start requesting features be added and the real fun began.
